text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the Intel Core i5. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Eluktronics MB-15 Thin & Light Business Laptop with Glass Touchpad - Intel i5-8300H CPU 2GB GDDR5 NVIDIA GeForce 1050 GPU 15.6” 72% NTSC Full HD IPS-Type 128GB PCIe SSD 8GB RAM!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the Intel Core i5. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Eluktronics MB-15 Thin & Light Business Laptop with Glass Touchpad - Intel i5-8300H CPU 2GB GDDR5 NVIDIA GeForce 1050 GPU 15.6” 72% NTSC Full HD IPS-Type 128GB PCIe SSD 8GB RAM!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The Intel Core i5 in the Eluktronics MB-15 Thin & Light Business Laptop with Glass Touchpad - Intel i5-8300H CPU 2GB GDDR5 NVIDIA GeForce 1050 GPU 15.6” 72% NTSC Full HD IPS-Type 128GB PCIe SSD 8GB RAM is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
